desc_content.paragraph: Configuration for the content_staging Django plugin application. See: https://github.com/openedx/edx-platform/blob/master/openedx/core/djangoapps/plugins/README.rst

section.title: openedx.core.djangoapps.content_staging.data module
section.paragraph: Public python data types for content staging

desc_content.paragraph: (OLX content that isn’t part of any course at the moment)
Read-only data model for a single file used by some staged content.
The status of this staged content.
Read-only data model for User Clipboard data (copied OLX)
Get the context (course/library) that this was copied from
